title: Multiplexed Sample
description: A sample that is made by multiplexing multiple distinct samples.

not.comment: Multiplexed samples should not specify construct_library_sets, moi, nucleic_acid_delivery, or time_post_library_delivery/time_post_library_delivery_units.

multiplexed_samples.title: Multiplexed Samples
multiplexed_samples.description: The samples multiplexed together to produce this sample.
multiplexed_samples.comment: A minimum of 2 samples must be listed.

multiplexing_methods.title: Multiplexing Methods
multiplexing_methods.description: The methods used for multiplexing and demultiplexing.

items.title: Multiplexing Method
items.description: The method used for multiplexing and demultiplexing.

cellular_sub_pool.title: Cellular Sub Pool
cellular_sub_pool.description: Cellular sub-pool fraction of the sample. Also known as PKR and sub-library.
cellular_sub_pool.comment: Barcodes coming from different cellular sub-pools could not be directly comparable due to the higher probability of collisions. Examples of valid identifiers are: 8A, LW231-2, SS-PKR_1, 4e.AB(678), etc.

barcode_map.title: Link to barcode map tabular file
barcode_map.description: The link to the barcode mapping tabular file.

construct_library_sets.comment: Do not submit. Construct library sets should only be specified on individual samples contributing to a multiplexed sample object.

moi.comment: Do not submit. MOI should only be specified on individual samples contributing to a multiplexed sample object.

nucleic_acid_delivery.comment: Do not submit. Nucleic acid delivery should only be specified on individual samples contributing to a multiplexed sample object.

time_post_library_delivery.comment: Do not submit. Time post library delivery should only be specified on individual samples contributing to a multiplexed sample object.

time_post_library_delivery_units.comment: Do not submit. Time post library delivery units should only be specified on individual samples contributing to a multiplexed sample object.
